iBooks Author is my favorite product out of everything created by Adobe, and I've used it to author over 150 books for my publishing company and others. It's an amazing tool, and one that I highly recommend to anyone who is serious about creating ebooks. It is a must-have for anyone who wants to create and publish high-quality books. The ease of use, the flexibility, and the professionalism are all top-notch

The development of iBooks Author is overseen by a steering committee of publishers, developers and other stakeholders who are dedicated to making the tool as user-friendly as possible for authors. The committee is made up of representatives from Apple, Google, Amazon, Simon & Schuster, Penguin, Hachette, HarperCollins, Pocket and other major publishing houses, as well as developers and content creators from around the world.
